resources.string: Going on a hike
Status of your %s device:
Other users can connect to you.
Other users cannot connect to you. Click to get more info.
All is well, your device can be discovered by other users.
Oops, unfortunately other users can\'t see you. Click to get more info.
Establishing a connection with: %s | %s
You are currently talking with \'%s\'
, who is \'%s\' meters away from you
You share your location with the interlocutor.
Your location is unknown. Click to get more info.
Now in touch %s
, is %s meters away from you
Find companion
Stop search
Talk
Already connected to this device!
An error occurred while transmitting data
Do you want to stop communicating with this device?
Yes
No
Alas, it was not possible to start the server for connecting third-party devices, because of this, other users will not be able to connect to you (you can). Let\'s try to fix it?
Yes, let\'s fix it
No, leave as is
Alas, Bluetooth turned off does not allow us to continue working..
Unfortunately, turning off GPS does not allow us to search for nearby devices.
The data transfer was terminated
Failed to connect to the selected device! Check that the \'Let\'s Hike\' application is installed and running on the device, and there are no messages about the inability to connect to it.
Set up permissions
Alas, without your permission to access information from the Bluetooth module, we will not be able to search for and connect to other devices. Let\'s fix this?
Location settings
Unfortunately, without your permission to access location, we will not be able to search for nearby devices. Let\'s fix this?
Sorry, we couldn\'t get your location. Try opening your Maps application and \'discover yourself\', the problem should be fixed.
Without access to the microphone, we will not be able to record anything and transmit it to the interlocutor.

The operation of this application is based on the search for nearby devices using Bluetooth. To work correctly, the application needs access to some device parameters, which in depending on the version of Android on your device may be private. After pressing \'OK\', we will analyze your device and request read access to the minimum required device parameters.
